title: Best of The Program | Guests: Shelley Luther & Chad Prather | 4/27/20
description:
Are you tired of homeschooling yet? Experts warn of “quarantine fatigue.” Dallas hair salon owner Shelley Luther joins to explain why she’s reopening her business, despite a cease-and-desist order. Nancy Pelosi now claims Trump’s China travel ban didn’t go far enough. BlazeTV’s Chad Prather gives a look at his new exposé, “One Nation Under Surveillance,” and how intrusive American surveillance now is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
